Brand Positioning

Fact 1: Who We Are

A description that make sense to outside stakeholders:

75 very unique condominiums in Vancouver’s iconic West End, designed to highlight the ideas and ideals that make Vancouver so desirable around the world.

Fact 2: Our Target

The broadest definition:

Downsizers, Upgraders and Collectors looking to own a piece of Vancouver: these are people who are excited/proud about what makes this city great.

Fact 3: Point of Reference

How we want to be seen by outside stakeholders:

Absolutely unique, never-before-done, concrete and steel interpretation of what makes Vancouver world-renowned. This is the Vancouver brand come to life.

Fact 4: Point of Difference

What is the core theme that makes us unique:

No one has ever used a real estate development to interpret the best of Vancouver so literally. Everything about our building reflects what has made our city globally-recognized, and an extremely desirable place to live.

Fact 5: Reasons to Believe

What’s the proof?

The Harwood literally interprets what the City of Vancouver brand has come to mean, here and abroad, using a real-estate development to tell the story. Both The City of Vancouver and The Harwood are Green & Natural, Contemporary, Leading-Edge, Creative, Safe & Respected, and Bustling yet west-coast-relaxed.
The Vancouver Brand The Harwood Brand
Environmentally-conscious Green technologies that improve our footprint and make life better
Natural wonders abound Our park-like setting and outdoor spaces, proximity to ocean, views, light
Creative Industries/Artisans Locally sourced materials and fixtures/fittings, Douglas Coupland public art and interior spaces
Modern and Contemporary Clean and simple design
Safe, respected, caring IPL and Strand history of doing things right, building quality, trustworthiness
Tech-industry hub Technology integrated invisibly, in a thoughtful not “flashy” way, i.e. view walls, view glass, air-scrubbing system, etc.
Big city, big city ideas Big spaces, for big living
Bustling, yet west-coast laid-back Not in downtown, but literally moments away
